comments.comment: I am writing this review after one wash (no discoloration, no shrinking) and using this product for couple of days. This product is amazing, colour same as shown, siz perfect, it's stylish, gives you a cool dude look and most important of all it's warm, trust me on this coz i am using this product right now in Manali and it's raining and judging by the looks of it, it's definately going to snow at night, it's very cold right now and snowing in the surrounding mountains. I never bought Mast & Harbour before this and i bought this product hesitatingly, but after using this product i am going to buy some more products from Mast & Harbour.
